html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-08012023-08-04LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Exemptions from and Modifications to Hours of Work Provisions Regulations and the Administrative Monetary Penalties (Canada Labour Code) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EXEMPTIONS FROM AND MODIFICATIONS TO HOURS OF WORK PROVISIONS REGULATIONS and the ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES (CANADA LABOUR CODE) REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide exemptions from and modifications to the hours of work provisions for specific classes of employees in the air and rail transportation, banking, and telecommunications and broadcasting sectors; and (2) designate contraventions of the modifications as violations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0180 Publication Date: 2023-08-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Exemptions from and Modifications to Hours of Work Provisions Regulations and the Administrative Monetary Penalties (Canada Labour Code) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EXEMPTIONS FROM AND MODIFICATIONS TO HOURS OF WORK PROVISIONS REGULATIONS and the ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES (CANADA LABOUR CODE) REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide exemptions from and modifications to the hours of work provisions for specific classes of employees in the air and rail transportation, banking, and telecommunications and broadcasting sectors; and (2) designate contraventions of the modifications as violations.
